texts.name: Victoria
texts.biography: Victoria had the makings of a leader from childhood, and thanks to her tenacity and charisma, she became the most formidable woman among the noblewomen.

specialty.description:
{Baronesses and Countesses}

Increases Speed of any Baronesses or Countesses by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Baronesses
